rows.label: tlk47300162_01_msg0001
rows.name:
So! Our village's biggest success story,
the great Rex, is back in town for once!

rows.label: tlk47300162_01_msg0002
rows.name:
What d'you think? Good wood, isn't it?
Liberalitas's not got many trees, so we
make the most of the ones we do have.

rows.label: tlk47300162_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Same goes for the buildings an' all.
We fix 'em up, so they're in a decent
state for the next generation.

rows.label: tlk47300161_01_msg0004
rows.name:
That one at the edge of town's getting
old, mind. We'll use it for storage or
summat, I reckon. Not sure yet, though.
